column5: I am hoping to launch for the first time on Saturday. It will be a family affair, my wife gets the first ride, then the kids, and then my brother who helped me a tremendous amount on the project. The question is; where do you guys suggest that I launch? Reasonably close to Hamilton, no $20 launch fees and hopefully a place to put something in the livewells.
Marineland isn't to far from you and now that the park is closed the crowds should be small...  I'm just saying... they have some big fish there!
bayfront park  la salle park  both free and close to home
Hope all turns out good albert,you put alot of work into your baby.
Belwood lake. Fergus,ont. water is down to 32feet from a norm 51' feet
